article_title: Obama Says He’s Frustrated With Immigration Impasse
article_text:
WASHINGTON—President Barack Obama on Thursday told Hispanic lawmakers and community leaders he shares their frustration on stalled plans to reform the U.S. immigration policy, and promised to take steps to on his own to fix a “broken” system before the end of the year.

“If anybody wants to know where my heart is or whether I want to have this fight, let me put those questions to rest right now,” Mr. Obama said at a Congressional...
